com.wit.android.widget.adapter

Class BaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.internal.BaseWidgetAdapter
        • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseMultiAdapter, SimpleCursorAdapter

    public abstract class BaseAdapter
extends BaseWidgetAdapter
implements AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter

    Class Overview

    Optimized base adapter to handle optimization of creating views for the ListView, GridView, ... items.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    BaseWidgetAdapter, AdapterOptimizer
